titleStmt.title: The history of Astrea the first part. In twelue bookes: newly translated out of French.
Astrée. English
titleStmt.author: Urfé, Honoré d', 1567-1625.
Pyper, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. Okes [and T. Creede] for Iohn Pyper,

notesStmt.note: Pages 372-73 misnumbered 362-63; 369-70 missing in number only.
